00001 #include "ros/ros.h"
00002 #include "geometry_msgs/Vector3.h"
00003 #include "geometry_msgs/Quaternion.h"
00004 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
00005 #include <cstdlib>
00006 #include <math.h>
00007 
00008 #include "mathutils/mathutils.hpp"
00009 #include "last_letter_msgs/SimStates.h"
00010 ros::Publisher pub;
00011 
00012 void translate_callback(last_letter_msgs::SimStates Odo)
00013 {
00014         tf::Quaternion quat = tf::Quaternion(Odo.pose.orientation.x, Odo.pose.orientation.y, Odo.pose.orientation.z, Odo.pose.orientation.w);
00015         if ( isnan(quat.length()) ) {
00016                 quat = tf::Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1);
00017                 ROS_ERROR("quaternion length is NaN");
00018         }
00019         if (abs(quat.length())<0.9) {
00020 //              ROS_ERROR("quaternion too short");
00021 //              ROS_INFO("Quaterion: %g, %g, %g, %g, len: %g",quat[0], quat[1], quat[2], quat[3], quat.length());
00022                 quat.normalize();
00023         }
00024 //      double phi,theta,psi;
00025 //      tf::Matrix3x3(quat).getEulerYPR(psi, theta, phi);
00026         geometry_msgs::Vector3 eulerVec = quat2euler(Odo.pose.orientation);
00027         eulerVec.x = eulerVec.x*180.0/M_PI;
00028         eulerVec.y = eulerVec.y*180.0/M_PI;
00029         eulerVec.z = eulerVec.z*180.0/M_PI;
00030         pub.publish(eulerVec);
00031 }
00032 
00033 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00034 {
00035         ros::init(argc, argv, "quat2euler");
00036         ros::NodeHandle n;
00037         ros::Subscriber sub = n.subscribe("states", 1, translate_callback);
00038         pub = n.advertise<geometry_msgs::Vector3>("euler", 1000);
00039         ROS_INFO("quat2euler ready");
00040         ros::spin();
00041 
00042         return 0;
00043 }
